charges.charge_description: Defendant did knowingly possess a firearm while being convicted by a court of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year in violation of 18 USC 922(g)(1). [ 6:03-m -95 ]

charges.charge_description: 18:922G.F UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. -- Possession of a Firearm by Convicted Felon(1)

charges.charge_disposition: RESENTENCED PER ORDER DATED 10/26/16 - 188-month sentence on count (1) is VACATED and he is resentenced to 120 month's imprisonment; 5 year term of Supervised Release is VACATED and he is resentenced to 3 years Supervised Released, to be served upon the completion of his imprisonment term; ALL other terms and provisions of the original judgment remain in effect. ORIGINAL - 188 Months Custody; 5 Years Supervised Release; $2000 Fine; and $100 Special Assessment
